predicate.note: Frames file for 'assimilate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: become similar

example.name: the one example
example.text: We really do know all we need to know, if only we could assimilate this knowledge into our thinking.

example.name: the other example
example.text: ''Mr. Allen objected to this analogy because it seems [*-1] to ``assimilate the status of blacks to that of animals -- as a mere project of charity, of humaneness.''
example.arg: as a mere project of charity, of humaneness

roleset.note: Assimilate to and assimilate into are actually fairly different senses, but easily distinguished by the prepositions.
